title: How can I manage Hifz of the Quran while studying? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Muhammad from India I want to become a but I am studying for a medical entrance exam how can I manage both of it how would I know this is your life sometimes you guys ask questions I don't know I don't know how many hours you sleep a day I don't know how many hours you play on your video games or you chitchat with your friends and you hang around on the streets or on your scooter this is something that you have to decide how to balance between your worldly studies and your the Quran when is the most appropriate time for you is it after F or are you a person who does it best between and I don't know this depends from person to a person
